description:
Max is a white Jindo dog who belongs to siblings Sol and Dong. When he is kidnapped by some bad men who force him to fight in dogfigthing arenas he must find his will to keep living and keep his hope that he`ll see Sol and Dong again. After eventually, escaping then must back a long journey to get back home to Sol and Dong.
Source: MAL (english names not changed)
name: Baekgu
